page.name: Customer Service
page.page_description: Welcome to the Customer Service status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Customer Service OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Customer Service's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [EU][Control panel & API] - Manager/API incident notification
incidents.message: We had an incident on Control panel & API offer in EU which has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 30/09/2025 07:50 UTC End time : 30/09/2025 08:10 UTC Impacted Service(s) : The Manager from the Control panel & API had a malfunction. Customers Impact : The customers were unable to manage their services due to the degraded state of the PCI Manager and API. Root Cause : This incident was caused by this maintenance: https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/l2d6drb598vf We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
